amendment.description: Amendment includes among the factors for consideration in selecting applicants to receive Trust Fund grant amounts, a consideration of the extent to which the design, construction, and operation of the housing reduces utility costs for residents.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-369 to include among the factors for consideration in selecting applicants to receive Trust Fund grant amounts, a consideration of the extent to which the design, construction, and operation of the housing reduces utility costs for residents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Frank (MA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
